title: From the Vault: Creature of the Gear
itunes:title: From the Vault: Creature of the Gear
description:
What is a gear and when did humans invent it? Plus, Rob and Joe discuss the only known creature to have gears in its anatomy. Plus hear about a couple of wheel-based mythical creatures in this classic episode of Stuff to Blow Your Mind. (originally published 9/2/2021)

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
